msg: Added form beans for Remote addr, remote host and single sign on valves.

author: manveen
msg: Added jsp's for remote addr , remote host and single sign on valves.

author: amyroh
msg: Add check for "null" string address as part of MBean name for connector since
MBean nomenclature doesn't like empty string.  In the case of address is null,
it needs to check for string("null") address as part of MBean name for connector.
Add null check for service property to avoid NPE.  The "service" property for
connector shouldn't be null, however, it's currently not set.

author: craigmcc
msg: When using the Manager webapp to deploy, add a container event *after* the
new context has been created, but *before* it is started.  This lets you
customize configuration properties in the same way that you can when using
the Embedded interface, in between the Embedded.createContext() and
